scenarioDescription: This test checks whether passing valid input to the API results in a 200 response
This test checks whether passing invalid input to the API results in a 404 response
This test checks whether passing blank token to the API results in a 401 response
This test checks whether passing valid input to the API results in a 200 response with unit of measurement as imperial
This test checks if passing a valid city name along with country code results in a 200 response
This test checks if passing an incorrect combination of country name with country code results in a 404 response
